title.value: SUM AND TENSOR OF QUANTITATIVE EFFECTS
title.justification: The paper focuses primarily on the sum and tensor operations applied to quantitative algebraic effects, which aligns with the title.
title.quote: SUM AND TENSOR OF QUANTITATIVE EFFECTS

extractions.description: This paper develops a theory for the combination of quantitative algebraic effects using sum and tensor operations. It provides quantitative analogues to monad transformers and extends quantitative algebraic axiomatizations to structures like Markov processes and Mealy machines with their bisimilarity metrics.

type.justification: The paper presents a theoretical framework for sum and tensor operations on quantitative algebraic effects.
type.quote: In this paper, we develop the theory...

name.justification: The paper is heavily focused on the theoretical aspects of quantitative effects and algebraic presentations.
name.quote: Inspired by the seminal work of Hyland, Plotkin, and Power on the combination of algebraic computational effects via sum and tensor...

name.justification: A significant portion of the paper is devoted to developing quantitative algebraic theories.
name.quote: ...we develop an analogous theory for the combination of quantitative algebraic effects.

name.justification: The paper extensively discusses various quantitative effects such as Markov processes and Mealy machines as models that result from the developed theories.
name.quote: ...we provide the first quantitative algebraic axiomatizations to the following coalgebraic structures: Markov processes, labelled Markov processes, Mealy machines, and Markov decision processes...

is_contributed.justification: The paper utilizes existing models such as Markov processes but does not contribute a new learning model.
is_contributed.quote: ...axiomatizations to the following coalgebraic structures: Markov processes, labelled Markov processes, Mealy machines, and Markov decision processes...

is_executed.justification: The paper does not involve executions or experiments with computational models.
is_executed.quote: The main contributions of the present paper are: (1) we prove...

is_compared.justification: The paper doesn't numerically compare its theoretical models to others.
is_compared.quote: ...were obtained as the composition, via sum and tensor, of simpler quantitative equational theories.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The reference is cited to establish foundational aspects of the models discussed in the paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: ...axiomatizations, it is pleasing they have been obtained... [MPP16]
